db:abstract.db:para: Downloading and installing with Qt Online Installer or Maintenance Tool.

db:article.db:para: You can get Qt, its modules and tools via Qt Online Installer or Maintenance Tool.

Via Qt Online Installer you can do new installations. Maintenance Tool is included in each Qt installation and with it you can update your Qt installation for example by adding and removing components.

You can use Qt Online Installer and Maintenance Tool via a graphical user interface or a command line interface. The command line interface enables installing and uninstalling without any user interaction, that is, unattended usage.

db:section.db:title: Using Qt Online Installer
db:section.db:para: You can download Qt Online Installer via Qt Account as follows:

db:listitem.db:para: Download Qt Online Installer for your host: Linux, macOS, or Windows

db:section.db:para: See Get and Install Qt with Qt Online Installer for more information about how to use Qt Online Installer.
Get and Install Qt with Command Line Interface describes how you can use Qt Online installer with the command line interface.

db:section.db:title: Using Maintenance Tool
db:section.db:para: Once Qt is installed, you can use Maintenance Tool under <install_dir> to add components and to update or remove installed components. Maintenance Tool is included in each Qt installation.
For more information about how to use Maintenance Tool with the command line interface, see Get and Install Qt with Command Line Interface.
